mapper.select: select mi_host_grade, mi_name, mi_description, cc_content, mai_city, mimg_file, mi_reg_dt from member_info a left join member_address_info b on a.mi_mai_seq = b.mai_seq left join category_country c on b.mai_cc_seq = c.cc_seq left join member_img d on a.mi_mimg_seq = d.mimg_seq where a.mi_seq = #{member_seq}
